page.title: 03THE FARM SHOP, WESTWOODSIDE
page.content: There is a{farmshop}in Westwoodside on Commonside. It has been running for three years. It sells fruit and vegetables. The farmshop and vegetable store are in some old farm buildings. The owners do no1t grow much fruit but they grow a lot of salad crops and vegetables. Some of the most popular things out of all the food are greens and in summer it is lettuce, radish and spring onion. They serve about 150 people a week. They try to cover most of the year growing vegetables but sometimes they have to buy from France or Holland. They don't use heat to grow their early seedlings but use a cold frame which they find is adequate.
